step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your fingers open as instructed.
Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead and fingers are open.
Focus on making a tight fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale.
Stretch your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Continue to focus on controlled movements and proper breathing throughout the exercise.
Good start for the second repetition. Maintain an open hand position.
Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead.
Keep your fists tight and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you inhale.
Exhale and relax as you stretch your arms back overhead.
Excellent control and form demonstrated throughout this repetition.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and make a tight fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Continue focusing on your breathing during each movement.
